section.sectionText: To engage in activities to educate, promote, and develop youth employment, work ethics, job skills, values, self-esteem, life skills, and career development; providing diverse and enriched youth employment options for participants. To assist \[in] the area youth develop into outstanding citizens, who are responsible and productive members of the regional workforce, and to create lasting impacts in our communities and ecosystems.
